Title: Provides medical indemnity fund reimbursement for care provided by a family member certified as a complex care assistant
Summary: Provides medical indemnity fund reimbursement for care provided by a family member certified as a complex care assistant; directs the commissioner of health to develop a certification process for individuals as complex care assistants.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to providing medical indemnity fund reimbursement for care provided by a family member certified as a complex care assistant
